page.title: 07Employment(1)
page.content: Our area of the Domesday Project is for the most part agricultural.The majority of people employed who work in the area work on the land.There are however a few small industries around who employ local labour.The industries there are tend to be situated in and around the villages of Bromsash and Aston Crews.Other people who live in the area commute to work to the local town of Ross-on-Wye or farther afield to Hereford,Gloucester or the Forest of Dean. In the village of Bromsash a man and his son work from their home repairing radios and televisions.The business has been going on for forty years.The house they work in is over 300 years old.They use all sorts of machines and equipment;nothing much has changed since they have lived there.
